name: Dead Legacy
description:
A mission is sent to the best paranormal experts across the universe. The opportunity to do ghost hunting in an abandoned spacecraft only comes once in a millennium. Then again, so is being stalked by an unknown horror.

Content Warnings
Rated T for off-screen depiction of death

Members
ReciproCarl (Writer, UI Design, Programmer), HappyTomato (Writer, Sound Design, Programmer)
Emirwin (Writer, Artist, Programmer), DarkMagoogan (Writer)
